hudson.tasks.Shell.command: # find all config files and copy them to svn working directory cd /var/lib for i in `find ./jenkins -name config.xml`; do cp --parents $i <%= node['jenkins']['node']['home'] %>/svn/<%= node['subversion']['repo_name'] %>;done # add any new files cd <%= node['jenkins']['node']['home'] %>/svn/<%= node['subversion']['repo_name'] %> svn add . --force -q --username <%= node['jenkins']['svn']['user' %> --password <%= node['jenkins']['svn']['password'] %> --non-interactive #commit the files svn commit -q -m 'adding changed/added jenkins job config.xml files' --username <%= node['jenkins']['svn']['user' %> --password <%= node['jenkins']['svn']['password'] %> --non-interactive
